title: SONIC_SatAM_Complete_Series[DVD_ISOs][The_Syndicate]
description:
Here, for your viewing pleasure, is Sonic the Hedgehog SatAM complete series!

ISOs were ripped from brand new disc at full quality with no compression. Included are all 26 episodes and the series pilot "Heads Or Tails".

Also included are the following special features:

Way Past Cool: A Conversation With Sonic Writer Ben Hurst

The Fastest Thing Alive: A Conversation With Jaleel White

Storyboard-to-Screen: "The Doomsday Project"

Printable "Heads Or Tails" Pilot Script

Storyboards for Unproduced Title Sequence

Original DIC Concept Art

Deleted & Extended Sequences

(and scanned cover art)

Total Running Time Approx. 9 1/2 hours

DVDDecrypter 3.5.4.0  (included because I KNOW it will burn the ISO correctly)

Brought to you by The Syndicate
